text: Chía is a town in the Cundinamarca department of Colombia. It is to the north of Bogotá on the main road to Zipaquira. Its history goes back to the pre- Columbian time. The name comes from the Chibchan language. It means "moon" or "month". It is home of the Universidad de la Sabana. Category:Cities in Colombia Category:Cundinamarca Department
title: Chía, Cundinamarca
